analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol:
	Contract ESlotsICOToken has payable functions:
	 - claimDividends (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#79-81)
	 - payDividends (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#81-92)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in ESlotsCrowdsale.stopICO (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#285-293):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(icoContract.availableTokens() == 0 || (endTime > 0 && now >= endTime)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#287-288)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endTime (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#292-293)
	- state (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#289-292)

ESlotsCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#242-265) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-icoContract.transferFrom(owner,beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#261-262)

Reentrancy in ESlotsCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#242-265):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(validPurchase()) (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#244)
	- av_tokens = icoContract.availableTokens() (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#248)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#256-257)

ESlotsCrowdsale.rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#209-210)
ESlotsCrowdsale.wallet should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#204-207)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#1): it allows old versions
DividendContract.payedDividends (/unique_chucks/28/0xdac7413b79394542cabbdef9d71e89d48862825d.sol#64) is never used in ESlotsICOToken
